author: Reuters Editorial
title: China says virus outbreak will not impact nuclear power plant construction
description: The coronavirus outbreak will have no impact on the progress of nuclear power plant construction in China in the short term, and reactors already in operation have not been affected, a nuclear safety official said at a briefing on Wednesday.
content: BEIJING (Reuters) - The coronavirus outbreak will have no impact on the progress of nuclear power plant construction in China in the short term, and reactors already in operation have not been affected, a nuclear safety official said at a briefing on Wednesda… [+576 chars]
